title: Analyze Player Workload Across a Season
description: A sports scientist wants to analyze a player's total workload over a full season to identify trends and inform future training plans.

tasks.description: Gather all training load and game data for a specific player for the entire season.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a massive dataset of the player's physical output.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify periods of high workload and any correlation with subsequent injuries or dips in performance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows the player was injured after a period of exceptionally high game and training load.

tasks.description: Generate a report with recommendations for managing the player's workload more effectively next season.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report recommending more scheduled rest days for the player.
